name: Kammu
greetingText: You have the cutest name ever! 🥹💗
textInChatBox: Happy Birthday Kammu!! 🎉 You're the kindest, funniest, most amazing person ever. I hope your day is filled with cake, joy, and smiles 💖🎂
text2: I was gonna send a basic text...
text3: But that felt way too boring!
text5Content: You mean so much to me
wishText: May your heart be light, your smile be bright, and your cake extra sweet 🍰💫
outroText: Hope this brought a big smile to your cute face, Kammu! 💕
replayText: Click to feel the magic again ✨
